meanings.definition: A short message posted on the social media platform Twitter.
meanings.sent1: I read a funny tweet on Twitter yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She sent out a tweet to share her thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The tweet she posted got a lot of likes.
meanings.sent4: His tweet went viral within minutes.
meanings.sent5: The tweet was so popular, it reached thousands of people.

meanings.definition: The sound made by a bird.
meanings.sent1: I woke up to the sweet tweet of a bird outside my window.
meanings.sent2: The tweet of the robin signaled the start of spring.
meanings.sent3: The tweet of the bird was like a morning alarm.
meanings.sent4: The tweet of the nightingale filled the forest with music.
meanings.sent5: The tweet of the canary was melodic and soothing.
